website_summaries.verdict: Good-quality monitor with an ultra-wide display that's great for multitasking and gaming.
pros: Features a full HD display, FreeSync for a smoother picture, screen split, and a great picture quality
Can be wall-mounted with a VESA mount
cons: some buyers have had issues with backlight bleed

customer_reviews.title: Great for actual office work, clear text.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for documents and anything else. Surprised how well the speakers actually work. I didn't even realize it had built in speakers. I had the hardest time trying to find a monitor with clarity and no pixel issues. Most of the monitors have been focused on gaming lately, which those monitors pixels turn the text choppy. I shopped around and returned a Samsung to get this one which is much better. You can display 2-3 documents side by side across the screen at the same time to expand what documents you need to see, or widescreen for movies.
customer_reviews.author: mike fischer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for video editing
customer_reviews.text: I do video editing and bought this monitor to replace two older LG monitors so that I would be able to spread the editing application across both monitors without having the dividing bezel down the middle. It was also relatively easy to set this monitor up to act as two independent monitors which was necessary so that I could also work on one side while having a full screen preview on the other (the reason for two monitors to begin with.) The video quality of this monitor is excellent and it came set up correctly as determined by color bars. The resolution is quite good. Overall, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schatzer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor with some caveats for Mac Users
customer_reviews.text: It's a great monitor but be aware of what you're getting. It's a very basic feature light monitor that is effectively 2 square monitors built into one super 2560x1080 monitor. If you have OSX / a Mac you will likely need to download an after market display software to achieve the 16:10 resolution. I had to use a combination of "Display Menu" for $2 and SwitchRes X for $15.00. I set it up in SwitchResX and then suddenly 2560x1080 @ 50 hz was available in Display Menu. Once set up it's sharp and really good.
customer_reviews.author: JordanC

customer_reviews.title: Died two weeks after warranty expired.
customer_reviews.text: It was a great monitor until it started acting up. About 10 months into use, my Mac mini (late 2012) wouldn't be able to "see" it and would default to my other monitor. I thought it was a software bug or maybe the video card was dying on my Mac mini as it is five years old. I would have to repeatedly turn the LG monitor off and on, and eventually it would all work properly. But, then after about six weeks of acting up, the LG just refused to ever start up again. Very sad story. So, when you amortize the cost, this monitor was about 3x more expensive than my previous monitor, for which I paid $1,000.
customer_reviews.author: R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, Sharp, Bright and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these babies! It's like mission control in my office. This monitor is incredibly crisp and bright. I'm not a gamer, so can't comment on the gaming performance of these monitors. I'm a developer and spend all day staring at the screen. I've noticed a drop in eye strain - despite sitting for 8 - 10 hours a day with two of these in front of me. I much prefer these to my former HP and Dell monitors, and the OnScreen control software that ships with them is a great way of being able to control window placement when running multiple applications.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Orton

customer_reviews.title: Sweet for what I do!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the monitor! It works great with my setup. I do quite a bit of video editing and allows for great editing frames and layout. I use adobe premiere and I am able to see the whole timeline and does great for editing. No dead pixels and the resolution is great. Has a semi-gloss finish I am a fan of the matte finish just because it hides dust and finger prints better. Overall I am stoked with my work station. The speakers aren't the best quality but what can you expect. Don't buy the monitor for the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good While It Lasted Less Than 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain other than the fact that mine has a vertical green line across the screen in less than 2 years. I checked its a hardware issue by disconnecting it from the computer. Mine was purchased on Nov 23, 2017. The vertical line showed up out of nowhere on Nov 13, 2019. (Less than 2 years) Screen was casually used in the evening hours after 9pm. Always kept in pristine condition. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Chen

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Mac. Screen is smaller than you think.
customer_reviews.text: Donna's Husband here. I primarily use this monitor for work and used it to replace a dual monitor setup. I hooked it to a MacBook with a USB C dongle. Unlike others, the MacBook found it instantly and the screen immediately sized itself properly. It works very well as a dual monitor replacement, and is much easier on the eyes than my former rig. Please note, the screen image does not take up the entire perceived screen area leaving a 3/8 in. black band around the outside of the screen. Some folks here have said is has a bigger bezel than the pictures imply. It is actually that the edge of the screen is inactive.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I was upgrading all the way from an ancient HP 19" square monitor. This LG was a great bang-for-the-buck, especially since got it for just under $200. I did a lot of research, review reading, etc. Most of the other monitors I was interested in were significantly more expensive, and I was having trouble pulling the trigger. This one came along and I couldn't be happier with it. Much brighter and easier on my eyes than the old HP I had, which was part of the reason for the upgrade. What a difference!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor.
customer_reviews.text: These things are definitely wider than your normal monitor. LOVE the software that allows you to partition the screen into multiple sub-screens. I really wish LG was not only supporting the AMD graphics cards though. I am an NVidia guy, and would have loved to see GSync instead of Freesync. I couldn't argue with the price on this, but I was close to passing this monitor up because it was coming with a great feature that I could not use. If anyone came close to this monitor with GSync instead, LG would have lost my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. It will stop working.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about a year and a half. I used it to work from home and occasional gaming. It was great while it worked. sometimes you have to unplug it and plug it back in. I went to switch computers and plugged my new computer in, and now all there is, is a white power indicator light, and no display at all. I tried holding the power botton down to reset it, and nothing. Hours of searching online and nothing. Tried to contact LG... not sure why I wasted my time doing that. Overall, I never be buying another LG product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for USB-C MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this doesn't work well with the 2017 MacBook Pro (with USB-C). I tried several different cables and adapters but nothing worked.
customer_reviews.author: X. HE

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Get a 4K instead.
customer_reviews.text: Size is good but picture is not. Very dark, weird glow on bottom. Need to drag images to my MacBook Pro for proper color, which defeats the purpose of having a separate monitor. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice ultrawide monitor for the price, my only complaint was really my fault, and I didn't do my research. I wasn't expecting it to look so funny/distorted it was 2560x1080 when true 2k is 2560x1440. And when I first bought this monitor I did not know that. So not long after I bought this I ended up getting rid of it and buying a true 1440P 2k monitor.
customer_reviews.author: @mazonFAN

customer_reviews.title: Died after 8 months. (updated)
customer_reviews.text: Owned the monitor for less than a year and before going completely dead. Won't even power up when plugged in. I'm contacting support and hoping it's just a faulty power cable. I'll update this review once I have more to report. UPDATE: I sent the monitor back and rather than receive a refurb, I requested a refund. They provided a full refund, which I used to purchase a replacement. Good customer service so I'm upgrading my review from 1 to 2 stars. Still unfortunate that it failed though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carter

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is the main monitor that I use to play games, edit photos and videos! I thoroughly love having the extra screen real estate to have multiple different browsers going. Having a split browsers works just fine for me since the bowsers don't get too minimize. When I play video games, I just love having the ultrawide, because I can see more than the average player that plays on the average screen 16:9 aspect ratio.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: ... a year and it has proven to be a great companion for gaming
customer_reviews.text: I am still using this monitor a little over a year and it has proven to be a great companion for gaming. It is hands down the best ultrawide monitor for the price and specs. I do not own an AMD gpu so I cannot comment on the freesync. Colours were outstanding out of the box and brightness is great enough for me not to be bothered by the large window directly next to me. Take the last statement with a grain of salt however because I am currently in Iowa, and it is winter, and we rarely see any sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Jimm3ron

customer_reviews.title: Good super wide monitor. Lasted 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor in 2016 and it performed as expected. It lasted 4 years and stopped working a few months ago. The Good: Super wide display area. Integrated speakers are fine and I used them a lot out of convenience. The Bad: Uses a single joystick to power on monitor and control menu functions. Joystick broke after about 3 years. I relied on the internal sleep mode to power this off when not in use. Monitor formally kicked the bucket after 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Heywood

customer_reviews.title: Good Product If You Don’t Ever Unplug It
customer_reviews.text: Used the monitor for about a year. Used when working from home, and for personal use. Worked fine. Then unplugged it to relocate to another room, and it wouldn’t turn on. Tried every possible troubleshooting option available, including trying multiple outlets and testing that the cord was working. And because I was just over the 1-year warranty, LG refused to help fix it. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: It was awesome. Out of the box the monitor looked great
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with the shipping.I ordered this as part of a new PC build. Part of the parts came from Amazon, the other from Newegg. I did a 2-day shipping and got it the next day. 0 complaints on the shipping time. It was awesome. Out of the box the monitor looked great, had no defects, and was easy to put together and slap right on the PC. This may not be the highest dollar monitor on the market, but it's certainly a good budget one and has very clear picture and sharp colors. Certainly worth it if you want a decent ultrawide monitor. And so far nothing but good things to say about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shanker

customer_reviews.title: Good, but upgrade to the curved monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I love the 21:9 aspect ratio, but at this size, or any bigger, you'd be doing yourself a disservice to get the flat screen over the curved one. The curve makes far more difference on how easy it is to view the screen than you might be lead to believe. I bought the 34" curved version of this monitor, and, although at the time the price was hefty, I never once sit in front of it and regret the purchase. The current iteration of my monitor is the LG "34UC98-W".
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Monitor for my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a fantastic monitor for a even better price. I use this with my MacBook pro 13" laptop. I connect the monitor using an hdmi cord. The image quality is solid. The color and resolution are outstanding given the low price. Best of all, I love the extra workspace this provide. Being able to edit in final cut pro while stretching out the timeline is fantastic. My only problem with this monitor is the fact that the power bank is fairly large.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitors for the price. I bought two of these for work and they do an amazing job at improving efficiency. Probably the best benefit was when I was looking at a wide spreadsheet, these easily get into the double digit columns while at 100%. The "OnScreen Control" is also nice. It allows you to make quadrants for viewing. Watching movies is also nice, although there aren't many services available that utilize 21:9
customer_reviews.author: Graveyyy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for video editing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor from the Amazon Warehouse deals. Great investment. Works very well for video editing and no lag that I've seen during gaming. I love the software that it comes with that allows you to break it up into multiple screens. When you drag a window into the area you want it to be, the area turns green and it resizes the window to that area. Zero dead pixels and I have no complaints or regrets.
customer_reviews.author: B. Howe

customer_reviews.title: The controls are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how deprived I was! My prior 27" monitor was excellent--I thought. Not so. This monitor blew it away! The controls are easy to use, the color is exceptional, and the wide screen aspect is inviting. Best of all, this monitor came from an Amazon Warehouse deal. The price was exceptional and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: W. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality that makes gaming a new experience!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I dont have the technical savvy to elaborately explain how this monitor is batter than the $100 generic monitor I had before, but all I can say is WOW! I purchased a 1070ti and with my old monitor, it looked amazing... but when i got this, it took everything to a whole new level! Even running games on ultra, the monitor handles everything flawlessly. I hope it lasts al long as my cheapo monitor...
customer_reviews.author: Mega-moto-lomaniac

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor I've had
customer_reviews.text: So I was a LITTLE upset, because I purchased the 29" monitor used, and it wasn't the one with the DVI port. This one has 2 ports, and Active Display port which I've NEVER seen before, and an HDMI. Thank God I had a spare graphics card that I could install so both of my monitors are working. The quality of this monitor exceeded my expectations. The colors are crystal clear, no pixel issues, no distortion of any kind...Safe to even say that I'd do my drawings and photo editing on this monitor alone. I'd purchase 3 more.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Crawley

customer_reviews.title: ... monitors especially for Amazon Fire and it is a nice addition not crazy about LCD but it does a ...
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: January 2018 hmmm thankfully I purchased this in October of last year for $247 it is one of the best monitors I have ever owned but I fail to understand why it is now priced at $309 Great Monitor but wait until they discount it again I have a hard time understanding retail pricing what did Chinese raise the price haha
customer_reviews.author: Theodore C Forster

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is super clean and I love the Ultrawide settings
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is super clean and I love the Ultrawide settings. Note that you will need a DisplayPort cable in able to for the FreeSync options to work. The matte display looks really good in gaming and in design work and the aspect ration (21:9) makes Adobe Premiere a breeze to navigate. I got mine through Warehouse deals and am very please with the condition. There are no dead pixels or major blemishes and the screen worked perfectly out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Gaming or photo editing
customer_reviews.text: UltraWide is amazing for games that support the feature, most do these days. The ultrawide is also great for media editing. I have had this monitor for several years now and it has been through a couple of moves and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Augustus

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but ultrawide format not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfectly good ultrawide monitor, with a usable base (though only tilt-adjustable), a bright, sharp image, and (as far as I could tell) no dead pixels. Problem was the "ultrawide" part: it was a little wider but much shorter than the half-dead 27" it was replacing. If you're not familiar with this form factor, CHECK THE DIMENSIONS of the screen before buying. I failed to do so and had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: If you own an older Mac, you’ll need the mini display port to display port cable
customer_reviews.text: I have an older MacBook Pro and it works. Just don’t use your Mini DisplayPort to the monitors HDMI port. The resolution will not work as ultra wide. You’ll need to get the Mini DisplayPort to the monitors DisplayPort cable and everything will work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bordes

customer_reviews.title: Ultra-wide Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent product from LG. Gaming on an ultra-wide should be the next real thing. Forget 1440p or 4k. For those of us that don't have money burning a hole in our pocket, this monitor is the way to go. Pricing is reasonable, the monitor looks great, and performs flawlessly. For those with AMD video cards, the addition of Freesync is a nice bonus. Would recommend this monitor to anyone looking to upgrade to something other than standard 1080p.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Boyden

customer_reviews.title: I really like these monitors
customer_reviews.text: I really like these monitors. I bought 2 of them for a dual screen setup. They are a great size, look great and fairly priced. My only qualm is the bezel, I'd go with something a little smaller next time. All around a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: THeninger

customer_reviews.title: I never knew Ultra Wide would be so nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first taste of Ultra Wide. Contrast, color, width, all of it. Simple an amazing display. It is about as tall as a 24" monitor at 16:9, but the width makes gaming and working both SO MUCH better than I could have imagined. 2560x1080 is plenty for gaming. 4k is nice, but not worth the price at this point. Stick with 1080 unless you wanna fork out the dough for what will be cheap in a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Elms

customer_reviews.title: Monitor is great, built in speakers not so much
customer_reviews.text: works great speakers are a bit weak but that's the case with all built in speakers. its ok for most tv/netflix but if any action sequence / loud sounds occur you will have problems discerning speech or quieter sounds probably want to use/get a decent headset or speakers for most things
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: It's an Amazing monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great for gaming especially RPG FPS and MOBA. It provides more content of game. It also great for office work. I can open two or three pages at the same time, listing them vertically to fill the screen. Super convenient. Color of the screen is sharp and accurate. There is no leaking light from borders.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Wang

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for software engineering work.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor to improve productivity. As a software engineer, I work with a lot of codes and documents, so this monitor is really useful to work with programming tasks. It also has very nice colors!
customer_reviews.author: Moises Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Worth. Every. Penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade for a monitor! I have it about 2 1/2 feet from my face and am super happy I got this product! Great image quality and the freesync works marvelous with my RX 480. Also, the control stick at the bottom to navigate through the monitor options is fantastic, is feels way better than having to guess and go as to which buttons do what on other monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton D.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor if you get a good price.  Included software could be better
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the software to control split screen use. It has a few preset positions and sized and does not easily vary from those. I found using a separate winsplit program works much better. Older games look terrible if they don't have the right resolution settings.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's going to be hard to find something better looking.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm not liking is the price hikes, because I'm really trying to get another one....or two. Honestly I know I would fall head over hills for the 34 inch, but since I'm not made of money, getting two of these for the price of one of those is so worth it. Anyway, there's no issues from mine. I'm 3 months in and I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: accessories missing.
customer_reviews.text: awesome monitor, very good quality but there was nothing inside the box beside the monitor. no dvi or any other connectivity cable or power connector. i had to buy the power cable from a local hardware store. the manual and the box says what should be inside with the monitor but i didn’t get anything. so dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Salman Khan

customer_reviews.title: Actually amazing speakers in this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I'm blown away by this monitor. Picture quality is fantastic. Viewing angles are great. But what surprised me the most is how good the speakers are. These speakers do not sound like monitor speakers. They are very loud with almost no distortion. Clear and crisp sound, not tinny like most monitor speakers. They even have a decent amount of bass.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: First UW. Took a couple days to get used to it, now that I am, I'd never go back. This monitor has amazing picture quality and is solid. The only complaint is the nearly 1/2" space around the edge that's black.
customer_reviews.author: Akashla74

customer_reviews.title: The monitor has a wonderful function, by downloading the LG driver
customer_reviews.text: The monitor has a wonderful function, by downloading the LG driver, the monitor can act as multi screen monitor. Various screen sizes available.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L. Chin

customer_reviews.title: great image quality, good software for controlling screen, affordable ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: great monitor, picture looks great and the LG app is better then I expected. I would recommend if you have limited desk space or looking for your first ultrawide. I upgraded to 34" curved but still use this monitor at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Q.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this monitor for hundreds of hours and it has held up great. I do not do any gaming, but graphics are great for the use I do. Other than the display being great, the speakers have great sound for casual listening.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is awesome! I use it for my pc and ps4
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome! I use it for my pc and ps4. Ps4 only works 1080pi so expect black bars on sides even so i can split screen it to view both my pc and ps4 at once.
customer_reviews.author: Al Dank

customer_reviews.title: Wider is better
customer_reviews.text: A great value. I sometimes have 3 programs open while programming and it facilitates that workflow because of the wide aspect ratio. The menu knob is handy and better than competition, although not often used. Can't wait until 4k versions are affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Died After a Year
customer_reviews.text: It was a great monitor while it lasted. Almost a year to its purchase date, (on the wrong side of that date), it stopped turning on. No power. Dead.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Widescreen makes the difference
customer_reviews.text: I own this monitor for more than a year now. Picture quality is very good! It’s great for movies but I mainly use it for gaming. The games that support this aspect ratio look amazing! You trully dive into the game.
customer_reviews.author: Ivo

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck monitor
customer_reviews.text: It's a great gaming display, color is nice, and the ultrawide is a life changer. But, it can be a huge pain in the ass to get this thing to display as 75Hz depending on your hardware setup. Make sure to use the LG drivers, Custom Resolution Utility might help you as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: Coming from a samsung 27 inch widescreen for gaming this was a good upgrade, but i have to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this monitor for a steal at 250$. Coming from a samsung 27 inch widescreen for gaming this was a good upgrade, but i have to get used to the wideness and it not being as tall as my 27 inch. Overall, really nice picture and better colors than my old 27 inch. If I were to buy it again it would be the 34 inch ultra wide =)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The color is super nice! SRGB 99%
customer_reviews.text: The color is super nice! SRGB 99%. No dead pixel, No bleeding light. Image is clear and sharp. Upgrading from a 7 years old ASUS 21.5 inches monitor to this. This is basically a 23 inches monitor with wider view. If you have an small desk , this one is perfect. If you have a large desk, you better go 34" with 1440P resolution. Free sync works. It does make the game look smooth, but you still see tearing if frame rate drop below 40 FPS.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Leung

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly as described. I bought it used through the warehouse and have had no issues. The split screen is awesome. It is a nice wide monitor, but doesn't look obnoxiously gigantic.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S.

customer_reviews.title: But overall is good price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Honestly for this price and this size, there's nothing i can complain about. Tbh it makes me wanna buy two more! Only part that irritate me is that, most video don't support the resolution. But overall is good price and quality
customer_reviews.author: CrazyTechBoy

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME ULTRAWIDE MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cheap monitor for gaming, the display has great color,overclock up to 90hz for me so that a plus since I don't have an and card, only downside is I has light bleed on bottom of display
customer_reviews.author: Yandhi

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for gaming and design.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for gaming and design. Can easily arrange multiple windows on on this extra wide screen. Image quality is excellent. Provides extra wide angle of view for competitive games like PlayerUnknown's Battlegorunds.
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great! The picture is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! The picture is outstanding, and it is huge! It looks like I may have a dead pixel out of the box, if so then I will return and get a fully functional product. Other than that, the monitor is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: The Daydreaming Warrior Poet

customer_reviews.title: Ultrawide Goodness
customer_reviews.text: Very good display 2560x1080 75hz The colors and pictures are colorful
customer_reviews.author: Boun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wide screen
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wide screen. Easy to set up. Good quality. I have not been able to figure out how to make the colors a little more vibrant, however it is still a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: An/La

customer_reviews.title: ... bargain that got me to buy and I am happy with the monitor
customer_reviews.text: It was the bargain that got me to buy and I am happy with the monitor. I don't have a lot of experience or knowledge to know if it meets the specs of other screens.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: 3 monitors before now I only need 2
customer_reviews.text: I use for business and previously had 3 screen setup but with this Ultrawide monitor I was able to remove one unit. Now I can see spreadsheets and other data more clearly in a single snapshot. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful. The bezels on the sides are bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. I will be buying two for myself. It is beautiful. The bezels on the sides are bigger than I would like, but for the price this is just a wonderful monitor.
customer_reviews.author: MagnificentCornchip

customer_reviews.title: Best 1080p monitor
customer_reviews.text: Best 1080p monitor, for the price, possible. Bought 2 for myself and another for the wife because of how impressed I've been with my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Xeirus

customer_reviews.title: Most video cards I tried this with would not work
customer_reviews.text: Most of the computers I connected this to would not properly use the native resolution of this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: George D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the wise screen
customer_reviews.text: Love the wise screen. I bought this instead of having two side by side monitors as I work from home. The sounds it's amazing and clarity great. Meets all my needs
customer_reviews.author: sexyglam

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the monitor. Only con is that Im noticing more light bleed than my 25um58-P. Especially the left bottom corner. The left top/bottom corner and right bottom corner has noticeable bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: JSLyu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im never going back to a regular monitor, ultrawide is amazing
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen
customer_reviews.text: Son likes the quality of the picture and the size of the screen for gaming. Aaah, who am I kidding. He would like it to be bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Yoga Jen

customer_reviews.title: Monitor out of the box looks good, but can make some real easy adjustments that ...
customer_reviews.text: Monitor out of the box looks good, but can make some real easy adjustments that are obvious engineering mistakes. Seller is good by all means! Monitor has a gloss finish should be matte, google why if you're confused. Also a big issue is the cord management. The cables are facing outward so mounting on the wall you need a good 4 - 6 inches off the wall at least! No DVI or VGA also! Monitor has a great picture, very bright.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one a while ago and recently bought 2 more. These are great monitors for the price. image quality is great and the response time is excellent. My only complaint is that they do not have the DVI input as imaged and the bezel is deceptively large. Over all this monitor is better than I could have expected for the price and the lack of DVI is nothing that a 5 dollar cable cant fix.
